CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 6, 1958, pg. A18, reads: "Hula Hoops at Heldman Center - Shown are two young ladies exhibiting their skills with hula hoops, the current teen-age craze which is sweeping the country, at the Anna B. Heldman Community Center.  Left to right, front: Ruby Powell and Helen Austin.  Looking on are Cullie Powell, Charlotte Williams, Walter Thomas, William Thomas, Bill Powell of Radio Station WEEP, Jeanette Butler and Tyrone Tuner. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Ruby Powell and Helen Austin with hula hoops, with Cullie Powell, Charlotte Williams, Walter Thomas, William Thomas, Bill Powell, Jeanette Butler, and Tyrone Tuner in background at Anna B. Heldman Community Center
